q: Apple (2023 10-K): How much capital was returned to shareholders in 2023 (share repurchases + dividends)? Cite the section.
Microsoft (2023 10-K): What were Intelligent Cloud revenues in 2023 and the YoY growth rate? Include figures and citation.
Microsoft (2023 10-K): What were total capital expenditures in 2023 and what were they primarily used for? Cite the section.
Amazon (2023 10-K): What were AWS net sales and operating income in 2023? Provide both figures with citation.
